detaileddescription.para:
Returns a two-site MPS 1--[ LB ]--[ GA ]--[ LC ]-- [ GB ] -- [ LB ]--3 | | 0 2
where we define LB*GA*LC = M on the "A" site and GB*LB = M on the right site
Returns a two-site MPS 1--[ LB ]--[ GA ]--[ LA ]-- [ GB ] -- [ LB ]--3 | | 0 2
Returns rank 4 tensor $\Theta$, with A and B swapped.
Returns a two-site MPS with A and B swapped 1--[ LC ]--[ GB ]--[ LB ]-- [ GA ] -- [ LC ]--3 | | 0 2
Returns a right normalized two-site MPS 1--[ LA ]--[ GA ]-- [ LC ] -- [ GB ]--3 | | 0 2
Returns rank 4 tensor $\Theta$, with A and B swapped.
Returns a two-site MPS with A and B swapped 1--[ LC ]--[ GB ]--[ LB ] -- [ GA ]--3 | | 0 2
Returns rank 4 tensor $\Theta$, with A and B swapped.
Returns rank 4 tensor $\Theta$, with A and B swapped.
